item.title: Bread - Make It With You
item.description:
작곡: Sung by / 작사: GATES DAVID ASHWORTH
KY: 8562 / TJ: 24814

Hey have you
ever tried
Really reaching out
for the other side?
I maybe climbing
on rainbows
But baby
here goes
Dream they’re for
those who sleep
Life is
for us to keep
And if you’re
wondering
What this song
is leading to
I want to make it
with you
I really think that
we can make it girl
No! you don’t
know me well
And every little thing
only time will tell
If you believe
the things I do
And we’ll see it
through
Life can be
short or long
Love can be
right or wrong
And if I choose
the one
I’d like to help me
through
I’d like to make it
with you
I really think that
we can make it girl-

Baby
you know that
Dreams they’re for
those who sleep
Life is for us
to keep
And if I choose
the one
I’d like to help me
through
I’d like to make it
with you
I really think that
we can make it girl-
